ProductInfo.Features:
FREE Wide Screen LED Monitor, FREE Power Boxes, & FREE 1000 Feet RG59 Siamese Power/Video Combo Cable Included In The Package.
32 Cameras: 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 24pcs IR LEDs, 65.6 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu.
32 Channel DVR with 6TB HDD: H.264 960H Realtime. 960×480 & 30fps recording. D1mode/960Hmode：30fps playback. Playback Channel: 1/4/9/16 Channel. Supports HDMI & VGA outputs. Support eSATA. 2 USB Ports.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support within U.S.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End Professional CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor, 32 Channel 960H DVR 6TB HDD Real Time Recording+Playback, 32 Cameras Effio 700 TV Lines 24 Pcs IR LEDs, iPhone Android Viewable
